description: This file sets up a JSON knowledge base with a vector database, loads it, initializes an agent with this knowledge, and performs a query to print a response.

classes.name: JSONKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Class representing a JSON-based knowledge base integrated with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base and can perform queries.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Method to load the knowledge base, with an option to recreate it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method for the agent to output a response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
